service.query: select id,order_id,order_type,province_code,area_code,part_month,service_code,queue_id,json_in,task_inst_object_json from info_message_queue where 1=1 and part_month=#{filter.part_month} and area_code=#{filter.area_code} and mod(order_id,#{filter.total_num})=#{filter.remainder} limit 0,1000
service.get: select id,order_id,order_type,province_code,area_code,part_month,service_code,queue_id,json_in,task_inst_object_json from info_message_queue where 1=1 and order_id=#{order_id} and part_month=#{part_month} and area_code=#{area_code}
service.delete: delete from info_message_queue where 1=1 and id=#{id} and part_month=#{part_month} and area_code=#{area_code}
